sn56.27:1.3: Dukkham ariyasaccam, dukkhasamudayam ariyasaccam, dukkhanirodham ariyasaccam, dukkhanirodhagamini patipada ariyasaccam—
sn56.27:1.4: imani kho, bhikkhave, cattari ariyasaccani tathani avitathani anannathani;
sn56.27:2.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
